<p>As part of the KSO STS series, iKerbals has given a few lucky Kerbals the view of a lifetime for a mission they’ll never forget.</p>
Thanks for showing off my video guys!

nice but where are the helicopters and the wheelstairs from?

Edit: Ok, looks like it has something to do with KSO, but there is no download?

Edited August 7, 2014 by acc

nice but where are the helicopters and the wheelstairs from?

Edit: Ok, looks like it has something to do with KSO, but there is no download?

They are part of the upcoming Phase IV of the KSO mod!

They are part of the upcoming Phase IV of the KSO mod!

Ah, alright. Thank you.

Then I've to wait.

Haha, it seems squad is slowly highlighting me and all the other video makers on my friends list

Nonetheless, as I said in the comments section when the video came out, probably your best one yet.

Helicopters make it very immersive.
Well done!!! And, thanks for providing the list and locations of the mods in the video description section
Nice highlight Westi29. This video series is probably my favorite one right now. And KSO is just such a great mod.

Awesome video! For me, that was nearly a cinematic o.o

Thank you so much for providing a list of the mods with the links in the description! I was about to ask for them.
Thanks guys and no prob, let me know if any of the links do not work!
